Introducing a powerful Chrome extension that brings real-time, location-based messaging right to your fingertips! With this extension, you can connect with people in your immediate area effortlessly, receive updates, and stay informed—all based on your current location.

GIVE US 5 STAR IF YOU LIKE IT AND DROP YOUR FEEDBACK  FOR IMPROVEMENTS

Why Download This Extension?
Seamless Google Sign-In: Log in securely using your Google account and instantly start sending and receiving messages from people nearby. No complex setup required—just one click to log in!

Real-time Location-based Messaging: Share updates, chat with people in your vicinity, or keep up with local announcements. The extension uses your current location to show messages from other users within a 5-mile radius. Perfect for keeping in touch with your neighborhood, community, or local events!

Automatic Updates: Stay in the loop without lifting a finger. The extension automatically fetches new messages every second, ensuring you never miss important updates from around you.

Instant Message Sharing: Got something to say? Just type your message and hit send! The extension instantly delivers it to everyone nearby, making it perfect for quick announcements or real-time conversations.

User-Friendly Interface: View messages with ease—complete with the sender's profile picture, message content, and timestamp—right in the sidebar. No clutter, no confusion, just clear and direct communication.

Lightweight and Efficient: This extension runs smoothly in the background, using minimal resources while keeping you connected to the pulse of your community.

How It Works:
Step 1: Download the extension from the Chrome Web Store.
Step 2: Sign in with your Google account to get started.
Step 3: Allow location access so the extension can show you messages from people nearby.
Step 4: Start sending and receiving real-time messages instantly!
Whether you're attending a local event, want to connect with nearby users, or just stay informed about what's happening around you, this extension is the perfect tool for real-time, location-based communication.

Download now and stay connected with your local community—anytime, anywhere!
